Class MappedRandomAccessFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.pdf.MappedRandomAccessFile

  • public class MappedRandomAccessFile
extends Object
    A MappedByteBuffer wrapped as a RandomAccessFile
    Author:
    Joakim Sandstroem Created on 6.9.2006
